title: Chicken Wings in Coconut Curry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1 tablespoon curry paste', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '8 chicken wings, each cut into three parts', 'Sauce', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '2 tablespoon curry paste', 'salt to taste', 'sugar to taste', '3 tablespoons oil', '5-6 medium potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', '1 tablespoon oil', 'water, as needed']
